name: has
title: :has() Selector
desc: Selects elements which contain at least one element that matches the specified selector.

examples.desc: Adds the class "test" to all divs that have a paragraph inside of them.
examples.html:
Hello in a paragraph

Hello again! (with no paragraph)

entries.longdesc: The expression $('div:has(p)') matches a <div> if a <p> exists anywhere among its descendants, not just as a direct child.
